participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Serene and introspective, I find joy in silence and deep contemplation.
participant_1.background: i live in alaska. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i am a buddhist. i have not spoken in three months. i like meditation.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and lively, I thrive on new experiences and love to explore.
participant_2.background: i am a vegan and i love hummus. i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i do like watching cooking shows. i am not a good swimmer at all.
